post-install-cmd: if [ ! -d "includes/droip" ]; then git clone https://github.com/themeum/tutor-droip.git includes/droip; else cd includes/droip && git pull origin master; fi
cd includes/droip && composer install && npm install
post-update-cmd: if [ ! -d "includes/droip" ]; then git clone https://github.com/themeum/tutor-droip.git includes/droip; else cd includes/droip && git pull origin master; fi
cd includes/droip && composer update && npm install
